name: Makeup Artist: Makeup Games, Fashion Stylist
name_original: Makeup Artist: Makeup Games, Fashion Stylist
description:
Why not become a makeup artist?

Make up with your style and pick your favorite match.

You can use foundation, eye makeup, lipstick, hairstyle, necklace and earrings to dress up.

Tons of different designs for you to discover, cloud, butterfly, rainbow, Christmas and Halloween, everything in trend can be an inspiration for your style.

In Makeup Artist:

🤩 Use eye shadow brush to create beautiful gradient
💄 Use lipstick to outline the perfect lip shape
💇‍ Try different hairstyles and jewelries for your style

Come and challenge your fashion skill now!
